header.heading: Welcome to Helwan University Website
header.subtitle: The Employee Attendance System is a user-friendly web application designed to track and manage employee attendance efficiently.

popup.title: Welcome Back!
popup.description: Please proceed to the appropriate dashboard based on your role.

sectionHeader.title: Employee Attendance System
sectionHeader.description: An efficient and seamless solution for tracking employee attendance, managing leave requests, and integrating biometric authentication.

adminInterface.title: Admin Interface
adminInterface.description: Manage employees, configure attendance policies, and generate comprehensive reports.

managerInterface.title: Manager Interface
managerInterface.description: Review attendance records, approve leave requests, and monitor team performance effectively.

employeeInterface.title: Employee Interface
employeeInterface.description: Clock in/out using biometrics, request leave, and easily track attendance history.

biometricIntegration.title: Biometric Integration
biometricIntegration.description: Ensure secure and accurate attendance tracking with fingerprint-based authentication.

sectionHeader.title: Mobile App
sectionHeader.description: Track attendance, request leaves, and get notifications on the go.

mobileAppSection.title: Your Attendance, Anywhere
mobileAppSection.body: Download the Android app (.apk) to check in/out, view balances, and receive real-time updates.

apk.note: After downloading, install the APK. If prompted, allow installation from unknown sources in your device settings.

qr.helper: Open your camera and point at the code to download directly.
qr.alt: QR code to download the APK

sectionHeader.title: Employee Services
sectionHeader.description: Manage your profile, attendance, and leave requests easily from one place.

todayAttendance.title: Today's Attendance
todayAttendance.description: View your daily attendance and check-in/check-out times.

viewProfile.title: View Profile
viewProfile.description: Check your personal information and update your data.

attendanceCalendar.title: Attendance Calendar
attendanceCalendar.description: Track your attendance and working days.

casualLeave.title: Casual Leave Requests
casualLeave.description: Submit and track your casual leave requests.

sickLeave.title: Sick Leave Requests
sickLeave.description: Submit and track your sick leave requests.

missionRequests.title: Mission Requests
missionRequests.description: Submit and view your mission requests.

homeVisitRequests.title: Home Visit Requests
homeVisitRequests.description: Review and manage the home visit requests you have submitted.
